name: Try to kill King Edd - [EN/ES/PT]
description:
Anna wasn't expecting this! Try to survive and save the kingdom from Edd's hands!

Controls:
• A, D and W to control.
• Right and left mouse button to attack.
• ESC to pause.

This is my first game made in Construct 3 to enter this ocean of talented developers! Thanks for playing!

If you want, follow me on discord!

Credits:
